LanguageData.ThroneRoomRequiredByHighestCheckboxLabel: Throne Rooms Required Only by Highest Titled Royals
LanguageData.ThroneRoomRequiredByHighestCheckboxToolt: Only the highest titled noble(s) will require/demand a throne room.
LanguageData.SpouseOptionLabel: Royal Spouse Wants Throne Room Too
LanguageData.SpouseOptionTooltip: The royal spouse of the highest titled royal will also demand a throneroom if their rank would normally call for it.
LanguageData.PassionSkillsCheckboxTooltip: Royals will continue to perform skills they are passionate about even after gaining royal ranks.
LanguageData.MajorAndMinorTooltip: Royals will continue to perform both major and minor passion skills that would be disabled. This is the default mod behavior.
LanguageData.OnlyMajorTooltip: Royals will continue to perform only major passion skills that would be disabled. Minor passion skills will be disabled with rank ups.
LanguageData.SpeechSettingsCheckboxTooltip: When selected, speeches that are Inspirational have a chance to trigger inspired skill states in speech attendees.
LanguageData.SpeechInspireChanceTooltip: When an Inspirational speech completes, this is the chance that an attendee will gain a random skill inspiration. 10% is the minimum chance.
LanguageData.AuthorityFallPerDayMultiplierTooltip: The amount Authority would normally fall per day is multiplied by this. 100% is the normal default rate. 50% means it falls 50% slower. 0% means it never falls and the Royal will never have Authority need.
